website_summaries.verdict: While this machine has multiple uses, including the ability to steam grout in almost any location, it also comes with some longevity concerns.
pros: Comes with 15 tools, including a nozzle and mop head for steaming floor and wall grout
Heats up fairly quickly and produces up to 45 minutes of steam
cons: Bulky design makes it awkward to operate in some areas

website_summaries.verdict: This compact steam cleaner packs a punch and includes a variety of accessories for cleaning hard-to-reach places.
pros: The size and power of this little steam cleaner make it a great option for small homes
Produces high-pressure steam at a temperature hot enough to kill most pests and eggs
The 48-ounce tank makes it easy to clean without constantly refilling the tank
cons: Comes without a convenient way to hold the accessories
The power cannot be adjusted, and water may be left behind on surfaces

customer_reviews.title: no support from the manufacture
customer_reviews.text: unit failed after I used it for the second time It's only 2 months old and they the manufacture said they could not replace it because I used it to clean my truck and that sounded like it was commercial use and not household?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner / fixtures are disposable and hard to find
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful with tons of utility. Two stars off for pre-sale communication re fixtures - they are totally disposable. Cleaned a few things in the house/bbq and need all-new attachments due to deformation/damage. That's fine, and replacement parts are reasonably priced. Would have been helpful to communicate this in advance. Other household cleaning appliances don't work this way (vacuums, irons) so critical to message properly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Seeley

customer_reviews.title: I'm a very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: I'm definitely anti-chemicals if I can help it, and this steam cleaner adheres to that fact. It comes with quite the assortment of attachments and I'm looking forward to using all of them. Tonight, I cleaned the inside of my oven door which had been neglected for far too long. I used the included brass nozzle for this task. The whole process took about a half hour and that includes the wait time for the unit to heat. I'm a very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Huang

customer_reviews.title: Heads up! Great investment! Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Had a terrible bedbug problem. Tired of toxic chemicals that are temporary at best. Thoroughly steamed every crack, crevice, furniture, everything. Killed every type of bug, quickly, cleanly. Have not seen ANY bugs after only one use. Outstanding product. Easy to use. Economical. Non-toxic. Cleans everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn W.

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a high temperature steamer in order to fight a mild bed bug infestation. Well, it definitely steams just not hot enough has the description states. There were moments where it was hot to the touch but MOST times you could place your palm under the steamer and it would be cool steam. That defeats the purpose!!!! It heats up quickly, but as soon as the blue light turns back up- you have to stop.. wait for it to heat up again before resuming. Which is annoying since it’s every minute or so. I had to return after trying it for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Karla R. Deras

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for upholstery, carpet or fabric or any kind
customer_reviews.text: I specifically purchased this to clean rugs and stains on furniture since it said it had such an attachment. The attachment for this function is a worthless quarter size circle. I more envisioned like a rug doctor type head that you rent from the hardware store. The rest of the tools are not needed by us and I’d much rather use a stand up steam mop than bending over in any case. Unfortunately by the time I got it all opened up and tested it the return window closed so now we are stuck with it. If any one wants it for a discount let me know. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rozin

customer_reviews.title: Works well, design issues
customer_reviews.text: Item works like any other steamer. This for home use and should not be considered a commercial cleaner. There are some design issues. - Handle gets almost uncomfortably hot - Filling the water reservoir is messy. There is no funnel included. Expect to spill water - Doesn't turn very well on hard floors - Power cord is too short for something that has 45min steam time. - Cannot adjust steam power
customer_reviews.author: TDalias

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: After buying and returning a smaller, cheaper, handheld version of this for finding it underwhelming, I purchased this item and wow am I glad I did. It is really powerful, very well made, easy to use. Heats up in a reasonable amount of time, has lots of attachments. Really impressed. Wish it came with a funnel for getting water into it because that’s a pain but other than that, no complaints. I’ve cleaned everything I needed to in just a few minutes. Love it. Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: L Kabo

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed. I bought a used version of this. 1. It came with water in the machine 2. Wasn’t packed well and the plastic came chipped. 3. It doesn’t get hot at all I can literally touch the steam with my hand. I’m so upset, now I have to request a refund and buy a different product and wait for it to come. Needed it today. 😡 DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Oswaldo

customer_reviews.title: Sterilize no products or chemicals!! Cleans like a dream!!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend the AMERICAN made steam cleaner!! Got the funk off my fridge and stove like a dream! Cleans windows beautifully!! Can’t believe I lived without it!
customer_reviews.author: dejah-thoris

customer_reviews.title: A Must For Tile Floors
customer_reviews.text: This is the machine you want to use if you have tile floors. I like this style better than the "stick" steamers because the pad is larger and the water tank holds about 5+ cups of water. Be careful not to overfill. I did this once and had a very wet floor. It takes about 15 minutes to heat up a full tank. TIP: dampen the pad before you use. This will prevent pad "sticking" to the floor and help it to glide easier. Well worth the money. No more buckets of dirty water to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: augustmoon

customer_reviews.title: Awsome!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING! I haven’t found anything it doesn’t clean easily. I just wish it had a strap attached where you could carry it around . Sometimes you have to lift it up to reach high places, and it’s awkward. All in all it’s great. I’ve ordered 4 for family, and went to order another one today. It went from 99.00 to 120.00, so I’m gonna shop around. I guess that’s their Christmas special!😡
customer_reviews.author: Lynne David

customer_reviews.title: yet not one of them worked for for what I needed the job for- I wish there was a part that is about a quarter of the size of the floor mop so that I can use them on smaller surfaces like cabinets and walls
customer_reviews.text: The steam gets very hot, but when cleaning my kitchen cabinets they were left very wet. I had to go over every cabinet with a cloth to make sure there weren't any streak marks. Lots of attachments, yet not one of them worked for for what I needed the job for- I wish there was a part that is about a quarter of the size of the floor mop so that I can use them on smaller surfaces like cabinets and walls. I once had a much better machine and this one doesn't compare (wish I could remember what it was).
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Broke fast
customer_reviews.text: I used it twice and only cleaned 2 rooms. It worked well but after about 30 minutes of total use the steam starts blowing out from swivel neck of the mop head and back towards me while cleaning... also the push button gets stuck down very easily and does feel flimsy. Didn't use the hand tools. Im thinking a bissel upright is better for my uses.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Golubski

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this product! I have been using it to steam clean the grout on my tile floors. We moved into a new home and I thought the grout was a grayish brown but after steam cleaning the grout is a lighter white color! So gross all of the stuff that was sitting on there. This gets it off well with the little scrubber brush. Be aware you will have to order extra little brushes for the nozzle as they don’t last long after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Product review: I purchased this steam cleaner from Amazon with great intentions to thoroughly clean my house as soon as it arrived. But of course I stuck it in the back room once it was delivered and totally forgot about it. After having the 3 cans of pop explode in the freezer I was really frustrated trying to clean it up and then remembered the steam cleaner! I pulled it out and used it and OH MY GOSH!! The inside of the freezer looks brand new! And it worked fast. Less than 1/2 hour to do freezer top to bottom. I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good machine / cheap attachments
customer_reviews.text: I've had this machine for a little over a month and I love that it can clean most things. Unfortunately all of the attachments I've used so far, the mop pad, scrubbing brush, and bristle brush are all very cheaply made and start to breakdown after the first use with the scrubbing pad being the worst, don't expect to get more than 15 uses with it.
customer_reviews.author: donna meyers

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: I like this steam cleaner for a few reasons. For starters it has an on/off switch the last steamer I had was on as soon as you plugged it in and had no control for on/off. I also like that the canister is on wheels it makes it easy to move around when cleaning. It has a good attachments for a variety of tasks. I use it to clean my shower stall and for mopping the floors it does a good job
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kill bed bug
customer_reviews.text: I bought to kill the bed bug it works greatest
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Im

customer_reviews.title: Helpful cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to use and the steam lasts a long time as you work on a cleaning product. I was pleased with how it helped me clean grout and tile and appliances. It did not 'melt' baked on grease off my oven door glass (as I've seen some steamers 'supposedly' do on tv), but I'm pleased I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Great investment, job well done
customer_reviews.text: Best investment! For 6 years we rented our home, and when we moved back the tile floors all around the house looked so dirty and filthy that a regular mop wouldn’t do the job. However, this steamer was a life saver! I spend a few days , steaming tile floors (3 bathrooms, kitchen, hallway) but now we’re enjoying our home and it wasn’t just cleaned , it was sanitised since steamer cleans surfaces so well! If you’re a clean freak like myself, buy a steamer
customer_reviews.author: Excellent Erik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works well. I have used it on everything from floors to walls to furniture. Doesn’t take long to heat up and provides enough steam to clean a large area. The key to using it is letting the steam do the cleaning. It’s hard to resist using it to scrub, but it honestly works better when you let the steam do the cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: KAT VON

customer_reviews.title: Steamy fun
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cleaning grout and steam mopping floors and greasy kitchen items. I have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: MJF

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the machine
customer_reviews.text: The first one I had started releasing steam from the handle. It was within the warranty and the company replaced. The replacement stopped working after one year. I really liked the machine, when it worked.
customer_reviews.author: golden woman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but good things to say about this. When people say its not that hot, they are putting their hands 12 inches from the steam. DUH. Try putting your hand right at the spout for more than half a second. Yea.. thought so. Does a great job. Be careful though, if you take too long of a break, the steam will cool in the hose and your next press will be a stream of water, so have a little bucket handy to do you initial shoot. Some hard jobs will require the use of a cleaner soaking first. I like using Simple Green full strength. Blasts away tough grime when you let it soak a bit.
customer_reviews.author: E. Johannessen

customer_reviews.title: Not for upholstered furniture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would clean my white upholstered furniture. Not so much. I should have known better, as it does not extract the water. Buuuut, I tried the squeegie attachment for my windows and I was impressed. After a while I started noticing black streaks being left behind on the window. Was not dirt - it was the plastic on the squeegie literally melting from the steam. Not good. I know there will be many other uses for it that I'll enjoy (edges of my wood floors, oven, grill, shower), so I'll probably keep it and keep looking for a furniture cleaner. Any advice there from anyone??
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Martin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this thing and cleans literally everything with it. She is stoked about this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Get an used model. It works well, but the water capacity is like one cup of water. It okay for small quick jobs, but if you have lots to steam, you will be refilling it like a hundred times. Love the attachments and how easy it is to use, but would have expected the capacity to be more than a hand held unit.
customer_reviews.author: BTC

customer_reviews.title: Should  not use on laminate floors .
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job on flooring , but the heat on the floor can warp them. its a coin toss . I have not had any problem yet , I use it about twice as fast as i vacuum . Cleaning counters and other things is 5 star . i like having the big tank , you can do more cleaning. I just bought a new and do not want to use any harsh chemicals on my beautiful appliances .
customer_reviews.author: Steven F.

customer_reviews.title: I had a Shark that lasted for 10 years. ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a Shark that lasted for 10 years. It was very heavy duty. This Steamsfast is made out of a very light plastic. One of the snaps that connects the handle pieces fell off on the first use. Returning and will probably try another Shark.
customer_reviews.author: iamdgall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Recently let our cleaning service go, I bought this to see if I could finally get our all glass shower clean, answer a big yes! Looks new again.. only thing this product lacks is a above floor surface cleaning attachment like for counters or appliances that would make it perfect!
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice steamer!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this steamer since 2014 and it's still going strong! I use it everywhere I can and am happy with the performance. I'll give it 4 stars because of the funnel. Water gets everywhere if you don't have a steady hand. Have come up with a plan though: Any plastic cup (I used a medicine measure cup) make a hole at the bottom and pour the water into it. Voila - no spill no mess!
customer_reviews.author: Matchzee

customer_reviews.title: 212 degrees of steam
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to do overall cleaning with out having to use chemicals. The unit I have heats up quickly but the heat of the steam is not hot. I can touch the steam out of the nozzle with my hand.. The whole purpose of steam cleaning is to utilize hot steam to kill germs and bacteria. The steam is not hot coming out of the nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Greenmile4206

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaner for the home!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical if this would really clean but it exceeded my expectations. What a great cleaning product. In our Covid world the product sanitizes easily and without harsh chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: Michele B

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it cleaned your grout, but it didn't do very well on mine.
customer_reviews.text: I use the Steamfast Multi-Purpose steamer often. It has always provided me with ample steam and I love the chemical-free cleanup. I have used all of the attachments which have held up well with time. It's a bit heavy filled with water to lug around. Sometimes the cord length and width can make handling awkward. The sole reason I bought this was to clean some dirty kitchen grout. It didn't. Maybe mine is very heavily stained, but it didn't make a difference and took too long to do. I still like it as it cleans up and sanitizes well with just water.
customer_reviews.author: homeschoolX3

customer_reviews.title: Love my steamer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Heats up quickly and lasts at least 45 minutes. I cleaned my entire kitchen including the stove, oven, floor and floorboards just filling it up twice. Also cleaned my husbands bathroom which has glass doors. Removed the soap scum easily. Extremely happy with this steamer! Only thing is you’ll want to buy a funnel for easier pour.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Durability is not wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The product got replaced and the new one has done the same. The pipe breaks as it’s not sturdy. Expect a couple years use maximum.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Sawers

customer_reviews.title: Bring healthy living things inside.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the cleanliness strength. Easy to use. Make sure you follow instructions. Please don't use around crawlling children. I used it maybe 10 times. I had stored it majority of my ownership, did immediate job well. But won't last, past a few months. Not durable. Again did what it was purchase for . Only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer to replace my shark steamer I purchased several years back. It heats up quickly and is easy to use. I no longer need to pump the handle (as I had to with my Shark steamer) to steam the floors. The 45-minute steam time is true as I was able to steam all of my tile floors without refilling. I almost look forward to steaming my shower and bathroom - notice I say "almost"; it does make cleaning easier. I highly recommend this steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Love this little thing it does get very very hot
customer_reviews.text: Love this little thing it does get very very hot. Do not unscrew the cap while its still hot...(lesson learned the hard way) The sponge pad melts as your trying to use it that it comes with so that will go very quickly. The scrubber tool was great on sink. Didnt find it cleaned grout at all but that being said i use it more for the mop function. I need to try the squeegee for windows and the direct spray feature is great to loosen up dirt then wipe away. Overall i do not have buyers remorse on this one!
customer_reviews.author: 😒

customer_reviews.title: Not as impressed as I thought I would be...
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of different little attachments that this steam cleaner comes with. I am not a person that likes the multiple attachments. I like to just use for a basic function & that is to steam clean floors. It seems like there is still dirt residue left after cleaning so I am not super impressed. I kind of miss not being able to smell fresh scented floors. According to things I have read they recommend using distilled water.
customer_reviews.author: GGC

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds me expectations
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I lived without this. Does an outstanding job cleaning my vinyl floors in the kitchen bathroom and entryway spotless! It works fantastic cleaning the glass sliding doors and tracks. I've only had my steam cleaner for about a month so far. This is the steam cleaner puts out high pressure steam, and cleans really well. It has a ton of attachments and is really versatile. It's well-made and sturdy but yet light and easy to maneuver and carry from room to room. I love this steam cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, small and compact.
customer_reviews.text: Good steam pressure. Didn't get the 45 minutes of run time, maybe 20 minutes tops, but the unit works nicely and I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what you get!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this steamer! I had a steamer about this size for several years, but wow, this is a magnificent upgrade! No more shooting steam on start up, an on/off switch, and a press for steam! On top of that without the steam constantly going it has a chance to continue build up and be at the ready! Long lived steam, great functionality, quick steam time, love the accessories, Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G

customer_reviews.title: my stove is super clean, my countertops are sanitized
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it does. I do wish it came with a broad scrub brush and maybe an on board caddy for attachments. I will be purchasing a storage bin to keep all the attachment pieces from getting lost. Also, you have to pause during cleaning to allow water to reheat enough to start steaming again. Otherwise, my stove is super clean, my countertops are sanitized, floors look awesome... Worth the money. Shipped super fast!
customer_reviews.author: amanda bailey

customer_reviews.title: squeegee attachment no good.
customer_reviews.text: The steamer works well. I am VERY disappointed in the squeegee attachment however. the rubber on the squeegee keeps coming out of the attachment in mid use on the windows. I have to hand wipe the windows but the steamer gets them clean.
customer_reviews.author: leftyapp

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Got it to kill bugs in the house without pesticide. Takes work, of course, to steam everything affected. But works great. Gets cracks, crevices, carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to clean bathrooms and it works.
customer_reviews.text: i have only used it twice for cleaning bathtubs and it does a great job. it has so many other uses will check back after trying them out...
customer_reviews.author: vickie woodall

customer_reviews.title: It's true what some of the reviews have said about the small brush tool easily getting beat up after 1-2 uses
customer_reviews.text: I've researched the top 10 multi-function steam cleaners before finally making this one my choice and it works wonders! It's true what some of the reviews have said about the small brush tool easily getting beat up after 1-2 uses, but I still use it and it cleans my floor tile grout great. If cleaning your grout, water will get on the floor so just have a clean towel rag ready to wipe it off. Once you're done cleaning the grout and wiping off the excess water, pop on the mop pad and give it an overall steam clean. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: J Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: I used the steamer the same day it arrived and liked it very much
customer_reviews.text: This steamer arrived in a timely manner. I have never owned or used a steamer before. I used the steamer the same day it arrived and liked it very much! The sponge attachment ripped on the first use on my bathroom tile so I was not happy with that, but all other attachments have worked well for several uses. Overall, I like the steamer very much and it has made the hard cleaning jobs go a little easier and cleans surfaces very well.
customer_reviews.author: mapaeagle2

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Does all it says it can do. I wish there was some gauge to let you know the remaining water level. Also a better way of filling and emptying it.
customer_reviews.author: KJ Cardona

customer_reviews.title: The tube funnel is a bit annoying, but I'd prefer that to something which breaks
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's an excellent and effective product. I LOVE THIS LIKE IT WAS MY OWN CHILD ACTUALLY.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It last
customer_reviews.text: Best steamer I have owned I’ve gone through a lot of steamers in the past so far has a lasted and we’ll see if it keeps on lasting I give it five stars so far
customer_reviews.author: Mauitender

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Loving the steam, but the hose gets in the way and I don’t think it will be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly well.....
customer_reviews.text: Works great for deep cleaning and very easy to use and amazingly versatile and do somuch with this....
customer_reviews.author: firstMarkyMark

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item
customer_reviews.text: This a nice item. You do need to read instructions and use common sense.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to Any Home!
customer_reviews.text: Life changing- cleans SO well, and without toxic chemicals. I am literally a walking info-mercial for this steamer. Bought one for my friend for her baby shower, then her neighbor bought one, and I convinced my neighbor to buy one just by telling her how amazing it was when she came over to pick something up. Grout is clean, surfaces sanitized- Love it! Now I just need to figure out how to find replacement parts because I wore them down from using it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great results!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my LVP flooring. Wet mopping wasn’t doing it. The grain traps dirt. I tried it for first time yesterday and was so happy with the ease of use and the results. Floors look great with no mopping lines like before. One small negative is how light the canister is...tends to wobble a bit. Haven’t used it beyond flooring
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Greatest lil' bugger around
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says and packs a punch with PSI. Grime no more, in comparison to others we tried!
customer_reviews.author: Tania R. F.

customer_reviews.title: I am really pleased with its steam power
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with its steam power. CleaNed our old cars clothing upholstery to look like new again. It is much much cheaper than any good replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Tuff

customer_reviews.title: Steam Cleaning and disinfecting during covid!
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much! Having the best time steam cleaning floors and carpets and basically places I want to disinfect! Now more than ever you need this!
customer_reviews.author: Mona Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Use it for couches and car cleaning. Love that I don’t have to use chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Errol A.

customer_reviews.title: You have to wait for it be ready and it only works for a few minutes at a time but I like that i don't have to use chemicals or
customer_reviews.text: Not a miracle worker but makes cleaning easier. You have to wait for it be ready and it only works for a few minutes at a time but I like that i don't have to use chemicals or cleaners but like I said its not as helpful as I hoped it would be and it's a lot of work to use. It doesn't work well as a stain remover but it does loosen up grime and is a great floor cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it almost a year ago and used it for the first time today, cleaning carpeted stairway. I had read reviews about it dripping instead of steaming. Mine worked great, no drips! Even though it uses no cleaning solution, the stairs are clean and smell nice. Since it does not retract the moisture emitted, I used a shop vac for that. Good combo.
customer_reviews.author: mt shopper

customer_reviews.title: Reviews helped me!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for amazon customer reviews ,I made a best purchased, very happy with my Steamfast.Very happy ..
customer_reviews.author: Nilay  Aydinalp

customer_reviews.title: No sofa?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it said it has multiple attachments and I wanted it to clean my sofa. There are no attachments or instructions for a sofa, or carpet either. I reached out to company to ask if and how these could possibly be done with absolutely no response.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Meckley

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this steamer. I have already used it on a few thingsl like the build up on my stove, my floors, and my BBQ grill and it worked great for everything so far. I am looking forward to using it on many cleaning projects in my house. If my opinion changes down the road after more use I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I used it the day I got it and it's now my favorite new toy. Cleans all the spots that have always caused me grief. The steam comes out with a good amount of pressure. When starting again after taking a break be sure to point the wand into a drain as the steam remaining in the wand will have turned back into just water and squirt out. Overall, I'm very impressed with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for my whole house! I used on my windows, walls, ceramic tile, vinyl tile and hardwood floors. Very lightweight and easy to handle
customer_reviews.author: bvkw

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This steamer works ok but not sure how long it will last...it is made of PLASTIC. no metal at all on outside. using it sparingly to avoid breakage!
customer_reviews.author: JEAN-MARIE SEXTON

customer_reviews.title: Good steamer for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had a good experience with the steamer good to clean curtains or you oven and other basic things but isn't quite powerful enough to get your cushions or carpet
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Far Exceeded My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This has far exceeded my expectations. I didn't expect a non-commercial steam cleaner to have much power. This has great power. I didn't expect a non-commercial cleaner to have much capacity. This machine easily runs for 45 minutes. I own a couple of rental properties that can get very dirty. I expected to have to hire a commercial cleaner whenever I changed tenants. Since I purchased this machine, I don't have to do that. Its cleaning power has been more than enough to tackle some pretty nasty jobs. It has a lot of attachments. I have found the machine to have everything I need. It has been a good bargain and I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this steamer it makes house work so much easier. This steamer is so easy to use and carry around the house. When my old steamer quit working I knew I needed to buy another and this one had great reviews and I can see why. We love all of the attachments and how many different jobs it can help around the house with.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great steamer...works great on floors and has a nozzle to clean corners, faucets, etc!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made works great
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as advertised great product so far only used twice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my sanitized home!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful machine! I am a clean fanatic especially during winter. I love knowing that everything is sanitized. It is portable and easy to move around. I love the way it cleans showers, kitchen, floors and bathrooms. Sanitizers everything it touches. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ant Bea

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this product acctually bought a second unit for my self which ended up having a faulty power button that shorted out and in the process of having the company replace it but overall we love the unit ..it works great
customer_reviews.author: wilfred dupras

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to handle, instructions are clear, lots of attachments
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money, it won't even steam the curtain when I direct the steam right over the wrinkles. Made a mess of the oven, I had to wipe everything down anyway and after using on my counter-tops they were just sticky and ... gross. Will try to return. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Sanitizing is easy with this!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for our home and our Airbnb rentals. It does a great job and just knowing you have sterilized gives you great satisfaction. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Thoma

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Steam
customer_reviews.text: Only used this once. I do like the amount of steam it produces. I am not happy with storage (keep the box it came in) and I will have to special order the right kind of brush to clean the face of the tile in the shower. All in all , it did make my job much easier, and the shower much cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: GJbean

customer_reviews.title: Put the puppy in a cage while you are steaming stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and the puppy chewed the cord. Had it fixed and love it. Puppy is a baaaaad boy, but cute as a bug. The product is great .
customer_reviews.author: Skeet

customer_reviews.title: To weak for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: The steam was to weak to remove stubborn build up. it was able to remove stains that could be removed with a green scrubbing pad, but was not able to remove stains that needed more work to remove it. I did not feel it was worth keeping it and returned. it.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando V.

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: It works it's purpose.. The only things I didn't like about it was that the fill hole is super small.. You need a funnel for it, and after you steam for about 5 minutes you have to wait for unit to heat up for a couple minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: It heated quickly and provided plenty of steam. Have used for cleaning grout, glass and my stove. It is lightweight and very easy to use. Really like the variety of cleaning heads.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A Williams-Rowe

customer_reviews.title: its not as it all claims
customer_reviews.text: it is not as it claims. it s ok for cleaning ceramic floors and bathroom floors. also the floor mat is not secured to mop piece.it also needs a cleaning towel that can be attached to other attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Nazer baradaran

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I love the idea of cleaning without chemicals. It takes a little longer to clean now and the hard metal attachment is bent up now and I will probably need to get a replacement but other than this all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Marva B

customer_reviews.title: Great for bird owners!
customer_reviews.text: We have pet birds, and cleaning after them can be a hassle especially scrubbing cages. This things makes all of that so much easier. No more scrubbing, and scrapping. I don't know what we'd do without this other then spend several hours scrubbing cages a couple times a week
customer_reviews.author: FreedomAndForgiven

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price, good solid construction, the last steamer I had as seen on tv melted the cheap rubber hose after 1 hour of continuous use cleaning grout, this one holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Schrank

customer_reviews.title: not strong
customer_reviews.text: The steam is not hot coming out. It only comes out for about 3 - 4 minutes before the water has to heat up again. It takes at least 3 - 4 minutes to wait for that to happen.
customer_reviews.author: annie garic

customer_reviews.title: Versatile ... if you want to buy lots of extra attachments.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with powerful steam, but I was disappointed to find that out of all of these attachments, none worked for carpet. Also the Velcro pads come off easily when you’re trying to mop. I haven’t decided if I’ll keep it because what I really wanted was a carpet and upholstery steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this steamer
customer_reviews.text: Love this steamer! I use it on my wood and tile floors and they look fantastic after each steam cleaning. The only issue I have is with the plastic wand floor handle, I wish it were a little more sturdy. In the past Ive used the Swiffer Wet Jet and went thru three of them in under a year because I kept braking the handle/wand, so I think I'm a bit aggressive with wands and I use too much pressure. Otherwise it's a great steamer and I love it! I highly reccomended this steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: No carpet attachment -
customer_reviews.text: No carpet attachment. "Customer support" sounds like someone from Bangladesh with grade -1 English.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Gorenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Crazy loud, but it cleans grout with ease
customer_reviews.text: I saw a guy clean his nasty tile and grout on youtube using a steam cleaner and decided to try steam after other products didn't work. The Steamfast works great and is perfect for what I need. Be warned, it is quite loud. Buy some earplugs loud.
customer_reviews.author: Dimeadozen

customer_reviews.title: More than Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the steamer except the fact that it stripped the new paint off my bedroom floor. This was probably more the fault of cheap paint and not a negative to the extent it demonstrates the steamer's power. Purchasers should be aware that a steamer will not substitute for manual scrubbing. You still have to apply some elbow grease. It does make cleaning less toxic.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen With a PH

customer_reviews.title: Too much moisture, not enough heat...
customer_reviews.text: This steamer is bigger than I thought it would be and it does not clean as good as I thought it would. It comes with enough attachments to warrant 3 stars, but I would not recommend it for heavy duty cleaning. Often, the jet nozzle will shoot out water instead of steam and when it does send out steam, the surfaces are very damp - if not wet. Is it bad enough to return? No, I will be keeping mine.
customer_reviews.author: Meticulous1

customer_reviews.title: makes a lot of steam
customer_reviews.text: It makes a lot of noise and a lot of steam. It makes so much steam that the floor is quite wet when your done. Unlike my other steam mops that the steam evaporates quickly. It holds a lot of water and is easy to put together. It takes longer than I am used to for the steam to build up. I would guess closer to five minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Love my new steamer. Lightweight. Wire and hose are long enough for easy moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Goyal

customer_reviews.title: I love this Steamer
customer_reviews.text: I love this Steamer ! The reason why I'm not giving 5 stars is because the accessory come with this steamer is in poor quality some totally unusable after one time use. However this steamer is still a great home improvement tools.The Advertising Video is not been busted
customer_reviews.author: bbll520

customer_reviews.title: Love my steam cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a few months after using the steamer before posting. I love it! It cleans really well. One tank almost does my whole house. I just turn off and add a little more water wait about 5 minutes then finish my house. The only negatives I have is I don't like the velcro pads and I wish it came with a carry case to put all the attachments in or if they hooked onto the unit. Also it doesn't come with a funnel to put in the water. I had one from a previous stick steamer that I use now. Really not a big deal on any of the negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn J

product_meta.title: Steamfast SF-370 Canister Cleaner with 15 Accessories-All-Natural, Chemical-Free Pressurized Steam Cleaning for Most Floors, Counters, Appliances, Windows, Autos, and More, 64 inches, White
product_meta.description:
Style Name:CleanerThe Steamfast SF-370 Multi-Purpose Steam Cleaner is a heavy-duty solution for those who are serious about steam cleaning. Using ordinary water heated to over 200-degreeF, the Multi-Purpose Steam Cleaner effectively and naturally cleans and sanitizes a wide variety of surfaces. With professional steam power and a versatile array of attachments, the Multi-Purpose Steam Cleaner is designed for tackling the toughest jobs throughout your home. The versatile SF-370 even handles floors with the included steam mop attachments and two microfiber pads that are safe for all sealed flooring surfaces – including wood, tile and laminate. An extra-large capacity tank provides 45 minutes of continuous steam. From shower doors to children's toys, countertops and barbecue grills, there's no job too big – or too small – for the Multi-Purpose Steam Cleaner.Hertz : 60HZ

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
IMPORTANT INTERNATIONAL DISCLAIMER: This item is built to meet U.S. voltage requirements and may not function properly when used in conjunction with external devices that alter or convert voltage or frequency of electricity. Improper use or shipping the product outside the U.S. will void all warranties.
feature_bullets: MAXIMUM PORTABILITY — Designed for ease of use with a 15-foot power cord with integrated cord wrap, wheels, carrying handle, and a 6. 5-foot hose that provides added reach for those hard to get to places.
15 VERSATILE ACCESSORIES — Equipped for steam cleaning jobs in and around your home including mop pads, utility brushes, jet nozzle, squeegee, scrub tools, fill cup, and more.
LARGE CAPACITY TANK — The 48-ounce water tank heats up in 8 minutes and provides up to 45 minutes of steam.

CHEMICAL-FREE CLEANING — Naturally deep clean without the use of harsh chemicals using hot, pressured steam to eliminate grease, grime, stains, and mold from a wide range of surfaces including ceramic tile, grout, granite, sealed wood flooring, laminate, appliances, grills, autos, and more.
STEAM SANITIZES — Steam kills 99.9% of germs and bacteria.

SUPERIOR SUPPORT — When you choose a Steamfast product, you’re investing in superior performance and design that will deliver total satisfaction. If not, we’ll replace it, for 2 years. Supported by a customer service team based in Andover, KS.
Built to meet U.S. voltage requirements. Certified, safety-tested, and warrantied for use only in the U.S.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,050 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: 2-Extension Wands, Mop Head, Scrub Tool, Sponge Pad For Corner Tool, Scrub Pad For Corner Tool, Brass Utility Brush, 2-Nylon Utility Brushes, Corner Tool, Measuring Cup, Squeegee, Jet Nozzle, 2-Microfiber Pads, Steam Cleaner
